item.title: Understanding compiler runtime libraries: when hardware needs software's help
item.description: Learn how the compiler inserts functions to execute operations that the machine can't perform with native instructions.

item.title: Assembly Fibonacci
item.description: Writing recursion in assembly forces you to understand how to organize your control and data transfers across function calls.
